description: TurboTax is a tax return application used to prepare and file U.S. State and Federal tax returns. The software is available as a downloadable desktop version for Windows and macOS, and as a web version called TurboTax Online.

The software comes in Basic, Deluxe, Premier, and Home & Business editions. Each edition provides different features at different prices. The Basic edition requires the purchase of a TurboTax state return, whereas the Deluxe, Premier, and Home & Business editions come with one TurboTax state return included. If you would like additional state returns, you must purchase them.
